array.string: Oh look, it's a new face. I haven't seen you down here before. My name is Whalezart and this is where I live. It's called the Tiny Barrier Reef.
Do you see those pretty rocks? Those are called coral. It's a very colorful place, but sometimes it gets too quiet.
Wait, you're not from the sea, are you? Oh! I can see your fingers! I only have flippers. That means you can help us make some music.
The sea is always singing, we just have to be clever enough to hear it. I think it’s all in the bubbles.
If you see any bubbles floating up, make sure you pop them. But you have to pop them in the right order, otherwise it won’t sound very good.
My friends, The Clams, heard you were visiting, and they wanted to come out and play too!
They’re really good at making music, but they don’t know how to work together. It’s up to you to help.
What ever color bubble you see, you have to touch the clam that has that color, so if you see a red bubble, touch the red clam! But you can’t be too slow, otherwise the bubbles will float away.
